name: Night of the dead fishermen
description:
NOTDF is a survival game about making sushi, where you use dice as ingredients.  Put dice you need aside and reroll the rest to find combinations which fit one of your recipies. You have to think quick as recipies will start to pile up.
The game gets progressively harder as you play, so make sure to comment your best score!

WebGL version crutialy doesn't have shadows and is a bit sloppy to play as a result. So if you liked the idea, please try Windows or Mac (not tested though) version for better experience.

Credits:

Fishing hook - 3DDomino
